name: Postal Panic (dumcreator, JRC258, Brother Blues, MinotaurBattleMaster)
name_original: Postal Panic (dumcreator, JRC258, Brother Blues, MinotaurBattleMaster)
description:
Oh no! The pesky gremlins are here to ruin Santa's workshop and now the gifts are scattered everywhere! We only have a few minutes left before Santa's departure. Bois,  let's save Christmas one last time!

Play as Santa's little elf helper and organize all the presents in their correct Santa bag. Achieve the highest score you can get during the time limit. Watch out for those meddling gremlins though, they will try their best to delay your progress of organizing the presents. The best way to stop these gremlins is some holiday snowball fun and swatting those pesky flies!
